events.text: Pakistan Army conducts successful test of indigenous Fatah-II guided missile system
Islamabad High Court suspends trial court proceedings in cipher case
Asian Development Bank approves $500 million loan for Pakistan's energy sector reforms
Pakistan announces visa-on-arrival facility for nationals of 126 countries to boost tourism
Karachi Stock Exchange crosses 95,000-point milestone for first time in history
UNESCO declares Mohenjo-daro conservation plan as model for heritage sites
Federal cabinet approves National Climate Change Policy 2024 targeting 60% renewable energy by 2030
Pakistan and Turkey sign MoU for joint production of ATAK helicopters
Lahore Smart City project Phase-I inaugurated with 5G connectivity
State Bank of Pakistan maintains policy rate at 15% citing inflation control measures
Pakistan wins UN Security Council non-permanent seat for 2025-26 term
Faisalabad industrial zone generates 500 MW solar power reducing grid dependency
Supreme Court issues detailed judgment on Article 63-A constitutional interpretation
Pakistan-China Joint Statement emphasizes CPEC Phase-II infrastructure completion by 2025
Digital Census 2024 reveals population crossed 240 million milestone
Punjab government launches Kisan Card providing Rs. 150,000 interest-free loans to farmers
Pakistan Information Technology exports reach $3.2 billion in FY 2023-24
Gwadar Port handles record 2 million tons cargo in single quarter
Pakistan Medical Commission revises MBBS curriculum adding AI and telemedicine modules
Quetta-Karachi highway M-8 section completed reducing travel time to 6 hours
Pakistan signs Paris Agreement on Climate Finance securing $2 billion green fund
Shehbaz Sharif inaugurates Diamer-Bhasha Dam Phase-II with Chinese delegation
Pakistan cricket team defeats Australia 2-1 in ODI series at home
Sindh Assembly passes Sindh Local Government Amendment Act 2024

knowledgeBoxes.title: Fatah-II Missile System
knowledgeBoxes.content: Indigenous Pakistani guided rocket artillery system with 400km range. Developed by NESCOM under Strategic Plans Division. Features precision strike capability and GNSS guidance.

knowledgeBoxes.title: Article 63-A Explained
knowledgeBoxes.content: Constitutional provision regarding disqualification of members on defection from political party. Added through 18th Amendment. Grants parliamentary party head authority over member votes.

knowledgeBoxes.title: CPEC Phase-II Projects
knowledgeBoxes.content: Includes Gwadar Free Zone, ML-1 railway upgrade, Diamer-Bhasha Dam, and Industrial Cooperation zones. Total investment: $30 billion. Focus on agriculture and industrialization.

knowledgeBoxes.title: Digital Census 2024
knowledgeBoxes.content: First-ever digital house listing and population count in Pakistan. Used tablets and GPS. Revealed population: 241.49 million. Urban population: 40.9%, Rural: 59.1%.

knowledgeBoxes.title: Pakistan IT Exports Growth
knowledgeBoxes.content: Key sectors: Software development, BPO, freelancing. Top markets: USA (40%), UK (25%), Middle East (20%). Remittances through freelancing: $400M annually.
